Unreal Tournament rises above other First Person Shooters with its solid multiplayer performance, from its good weapon balance to its great level design. The numerous game types and mini-mods that ship with the game give you plenty of options right out of the box, and the large variety of great maps ensure a fast-paced and exciting game, no matter how many players you've got.

The game has the latest Cider version implemented (1632 a.k.a. Spore Cider).
It has been altered to run on OSX Leopard and Tiger.

Notes:
There are two UT packs included with this torrent.
The first one (wrapped inside the DMG) is a clean install of UT GOTY Edition (ca. 700 Megs).
The second one (inside the ZIP file) is a huge modded install of UT GOTY, that has nearly 750 custom maps + dozens of new gametypes and player skins implemented. (ca. 3,6 GB)

This is the reason why I have included both versions.

If you want a more stable game just use the clean install.
If you want all the shit, then download the huge install.
(It appears that the more files are installed the more crashes occur.)
You can try and delete content that you don't want or transfer it from one install to another and hope that it makes the game more stable.
The game did not crash under Windows XP - so I guess this is a Cider realted bug again.
Edit: If you want to play this in Windows you'll need to update some ini files:
http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?gyygj3lmynk, or otherwise you will end up with a black screen of death.
This patch is also recommended for use with Cider - it will improve stability a little bit.
